overview: The hottest group of friends of the Mediterranean coast invite you for a cruise you'l never forget. These six beautiful swingers just want one thing : fuck as much as they can. It all starts by the pool when Mya, a pretty exhibitionist swims naked in front of her friends. What she really wants is to fuck Lorenzo. The couple will just fuck in front of their friends before going on a cruise on Lorenzo's boat. Welcome to the fuck boat.
title: Swinging Cruise
